m_szDocTitle: Burlington, Oakville students excel at national science fair in Montreal
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Burlington, Oakville students excel at national... | May 24, 2016  |  Vote 0    0 Burlington, Oakville students excel at national science fair in Montreal Burlington, Oakville students excel at national science fair in Montreal Photo by the Bay Area Science and Engineering Fair Caroline Mahut of M.M. Robinson High School won a gold medal and a special award at the recent national science and engineering fair in Montreal. Burlington, Oakville students excel at national science fair in Montreal Photo by the Bay Area Science and Engineering Fair Katie Brent of Not
